attributes.action: Refuse to have another EU referendum.
attributes.additional_details:
The simple facts are: 
1 The vote was legitimate
2 The Government have accepted the vote
3 The EC have accepted the vote
4 The cost to the country would reach ridiculous amounts of our hard earned tax payments. 
5 Don't be a sore loser
attributes.background: The British People have spoken at great financial cost to them both leading up to and in the aftermath of the Leave result. There is now no reason to have another referendum at great cost to the country and we must accept the vote of the Great British Public
